body: The earth opens up her secrets to your perceptions.
name: Murmurs of Earth
url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Races/Oreads/New Racial Rules/Oread Feats/Murmurs of Earth

sections.body: Echoes of Stone, character level 9th, oread.
sections.name: Prerequisites

sections.body: You gain a limited form of tremorsense. As a move action, you become aware of all creatures within 15 feet that are in contact with the ground at that moment.
sections.name: Benefit
